modName: Gift of the Void - Lucien Lachance is back
summary:
Get grim and shadow Lucien Lachance back into TES world with my very first mod.
The assassin is ready to kill for you. The marriage option is also available.

Hail the Sythis!
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Times New Roman][b]Gift of the Void
[/b][size=2]by FemmeInfernale[/size]
[/font][/center][center]
[img]https://img00.deviantart.net/47cf/i/2018/182/2/6/tes_v_skyrim__gift_of_the_void_by_femmeinfernale-dcfy3dy.jpg[/img]﻿[/center]

[size=4]Don't you think it is something really wrong with Skyrim's Dark Brotherhood?
If you feel that it needs Black Hand's cold and rigorous grab - this mode is definitely for you!
A new short quest line with additional lore-friendly characters for your Dark Brotherhood Sanctuary!

Besides, if you dreamed about [u]getting[/u] gorgeous [u]Lucien Lachance[/u] back - you may meet him during this new journey. Who knows? ;)[/size]


[u]This mod allows:
[/u]
- to have Lucien Lachance back (with original appearance and voice: the head mesh and voice lines were made from the original Oblivion game by me);

- to take him with you for your adventures as a companion;

- for femChars - to marry him!


[size=4][b]To start the quest[/b] you need to complete the Dark Brotherhood main questline and make the full upgrade of Dawnstar Sanctuary.
Then - wait for the news! ;)
It is safe to install mid-game. No vanilla content has been edited.[/size]



[center][b][size=4]Gift of the Void: the[/size][/b][b][size=4] walkthrough [/size][/b]
(for first impressions and the ones who are lazy to play):[/center]

[center][youtube]Z8SGZKkDjd8[/youtube][/center][center](Thanks [url=https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCViNGg4ic4vfopYIKYashXg]Dovaal[/url]﻿ for helping with video)[/center]

[u][b]Important! [/b][/u]
[u]The circumstances of publication that you [b]need[/b] to know:
[/u]
1) The mod was made by me (FemmeInfernale aka Arven_Elvie) in 2013 (yep, that long ago! :) )

2) Although the voices in the mode are English, [b]the text of this mode is Russian[/b]. I am terribly sorry, but [u]I really have no time for translation myself[/u] now and can't delay the publication anymore: you should have the damn file finally!)
[u]The translators (especially to English) are really welcome[/u]: just keep the credits of the original file to me and leave the link to this publication. [b]Your help is really appreciated![/b]

3) The mode [b]was not tested[/b] on English version of the game. The reason is above (sorry again!). The testers are welcome as well and thanks for your help in advance!

Also, I gave my own voice to Eville, you will meet her (in 2013 my English wasn't perfect, so there are few mistakes :) Still, hope you enjoy my work!).
The [url=https://www.deviantart.com/femmeinfernale/art/TES-V-SKYRIM-Gift-of-the-Void-752379046]art for the mod[/url] was made by me as well.

Please let me know if something is not working properly.
author: Arven_Elvie aka FemmeInfernale
